content.en-US: DUMMY PINNED MESSAGE: Lorem ipsum dolor sit amet, consectetur adipiscing elit, sed do eiusmod tempor incididunt ut labore et dolore magna aliqua.
The formation "Jungle Rules" in Infinity War will add a structure on 2023-03-06.
content.zh-TW: 無限戰爭中的「叢林法則」陣行將在三月六號添加建築物。
content.ja: インフィニティウォーの陣形「ジャングルの律法」は3月6日に構造物を追加されますます。

content.en-US: The formation "Greenbelt" in Infinity War will be replaced by a new formation "[Outlaws](https://cdn.discordapp.com/attachments/658964105046261760/1034732590034329661/6bca220d8b30d458.png)" on 2022-11-10.

The formation "Watch Out" in Infinity War will be replaced by a new formation "[Call of Wild](https://cdn.discordapp.com/attachments/658964105046261760/1049532300137865266/2839939227d4224d.png)" on 2022-12-13.
